name: terraform-provider-mimir
description: This terraform provider allows you to interact with grafana mimir.

name: terraform-provider-loki
description: This terraform provider allows you to interact with grafana loki.

name: acme-manager
description: Manage acme certificates and store them to vault

name: foreman_exporter
description: A Prometheus exporter that exposes Foreman metrics with caching and high availability support.

name: slam
description: Send alertmanager alerts notifications to slack without creating webhook url for each slack channel.

name: promk
description: Prometheus Keepalive Agent - sends an up metric to a Prometheus remote-write endpoint at regular intervals.

name: sectigo-client
description: An (unofficial) client for the sectigo Web-API.
